doc.field: C G L M T f0273reute r f BC-BRAZILIAN-MONTHLY-INF 03-19 0067

Brazilian consumer prices rose 13.9 pct in February, compared with January's record rate of 16.8 pct, the Brazilian Geography and Statistics Institute (IBGE) said in a statement. The February rise brought the increase in consumer prices since the introduction of the anti-inflation Cruzado Plan a year ago to 62.5 pct. REUTER
